location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.2044 of 1853 from Henry Edward Goldsmid, Secretary to the Government, Bombay, to Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is a confirmation of receipt by Goldsmid of Kemball's earlier letter of 14 March 1853 (folio 17), stating that the Government awaits further report from Kemball on the plunder of two boats belonging to Bahrain by the Sheikh of Junnah.
